ygData.subject: Re: Shark attack/Ragnar/Katya
ygData.msgSnippet: Ragnar neglected to take into account the weapon s rapid motion - the slug misses the lashknife and goes straight to Fury, rocking the smaller warrior.  Riekan

Ragnar neglected to take into account the weapon's rapid motion - the 
slug misses the lashknife and goes straight to Fury, rocking the 
smaller warrior.  Riekan kicks at Ragnar, hoping to drive him back a 
bit, and fires again.

The shots pepper Pumpskin's hide, but fail to penetrate.  'Relative' 
leaves a lot open, and the warrior's weak points are still tough.  
When he hears what Blackfang has to say, he stops and thinks about 
it.  "You know, that's a very good point.  Why am I doing this?"

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Nic" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> Ragnar raised his arm and the harpoon exploded. A searing burn ran 
> across his arm, but he managed to twist enough to fire his Gauss at 
> Fury. The slug went straight at the knife, which would break 
> inevitably, and past it at Fury.
> 
> The blond Clansman looked at his limb and saw it in a bloddy 
metallic 
> mess. Adrenaline was still high, but he would not last.
> 
> Katya saw a breach and fired between the tentacles.
> 
> Blackfang leaped back and out of most of the tentacles way. 
However, 
> his shotgun was taken out of his grip. He drew his pulse laser and 
> fired small quick shots as near as he could to the gash.
> 
> Blackfang: Why the hell are you doing this then? You're on our side!
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> > Riekan takes the hit, all right, but he's sturdy enough to 
maintain 
> > his point-blank position long enough to fire his harpoon gun.  At 
> > this range, Ragnar could be ripped wide open by such a blast.  
Fury 
> > whirls his blade, waiting for another opening.
> > 
> > Most of the fire impacts on Pumpskin's self-regenerating limbs, 
but 
> > Blackfang scores a solid body hit with his last shot - and this 
> wound 
> > doesn't close itself up right away, betraying the relative 
> > vulnerability of his torso.
> > 
> > "Hee hee, you're a perceptive one!" Pumpskin chuckles as he 
flails 
> in 
> > both directions, looking to give each of them a two-tentacle 
hug.  
> > All four appendages stretch out to their maximum length again.
